TopicTitle: [Mod Craft] Space Walmart and other assorted command modules

Articles.Content:
This is my Space Walmart. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

It is part of a mod pack I made containing every other command module I have made but I've fixed some of them for KSP 1.0. Just in case you are interested....

download link:

[http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/228806-spaceliner](http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/228806-spaceliner)

![D20C0D9F174E4AE396EBF0685CA59B6DDE25D36C](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/719791555840651078/D20C0D9F174E4AE396EBF0685CA59B6DDE25D36C/)

![BE6415CFD58AFC28A3F0DFFFA308CED523025918](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/719791555837526104/BE6415CFD58AFC28A3F0DFFFA308CED523025918/)

There is a parking lot on the bottom...

![B44D25799124D11C288E02BC6A47D9C74B4B1A55](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/719791555837524758/B44D25799124D11C288E02BC6A47D9C74B4B1A55/)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-03T11:17:09Z" title="05/03/2015 11:17  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 3, 2015</time> by unsociableTim**

Sweet!

I shall be adding this shortly to your mod thread here ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116405-Tim-Yam-s-Spaceliner-Habitats-Birds-of-Prey-Walmart-Galactic-and-Cats-in-Space%21?p=1856583#post1856583](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116405-Tim-Yam-s-Spaceliner-Habitats-Birds-of-Prey-Walmart-Galactic-and-Cats-in-Space%21?p=1856583#post1856583)
This is the most edgiest thing I've ever seen. I love it! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
wow soooooo cool I dont know which is better the outside or the internals ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Seems Like a good, Heck Wounderful idea , great going , but may i make a suggestion, ? ..**

**Looks like there are no 'working' lights in the store " yes i know we are all lazy , and we wont place lights "** 

**but in reallife and in the future if walmart still exist it will have custom built lights for its interior** 

**thats all thanx for takeing the couple minuts of your time for reading this comment . ~TheDwarf**
